content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
--This is multiline json hence rowterminator not required but we can give rowterminator as '0x0a'
SELECT
    *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
) WITH (
    JsonData NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type;

--Correct way for reading multiline json
SELECT
    *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (
    JsonData NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type;

--specify columns with JSON_VALUE
SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, '$.payment_type') AS TINYINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(20)) AS payment_type_desc
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (
    JsonData NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type;

--Check data type
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, ''$.payment_type'') AS TINYINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, ''$.payment_type_desc'') AS VARCHAR(20)) AS payment_type_desc
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''payment_type.json'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ''0x0b'',
    FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b''
) WITH (
    JsonData NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type
';

--Query multiline json with OPENJSON
select
    payment_type,
    payment_type_desc
from openrowset(
        bulk 'payment_type.json',
        data_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (JsonData nvarchar(max)) as payment_type
    cross apply openjson (JsonData)
        with (  payment_type tinyint,
                payment_type_desc varchar(20));

--Change column name
--Query multiline json with OPENJSON
select
    payment_type,
    description
from openrowset(
        bulk 'payment_type.json',
        data_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (JsonData nvarchar(max)) as payment_type
    cross apply openjson (JsonData)
        with (  payment_type tinyint,
                description varchar(20) '$.payment_type_desc');


----------------------------------------------------------------------
            ---Reading data from json with array---
----------------------------------------------------------------------
select
    payment_type,
    payment_sub_type,
    description
from openrowset(
        bulk 'payment_type_array.json',
        data_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (JsonData nvarchar(max)) as payment_type
    cross apply openjson (JsonData)
        with (  payment_type tinyint,
                payment_sub_type tinyint '$.payment_type_desc[0].sub_type',
                description varchar(20) '$.payment_type_desc[0].value');

--{"payment_type":5,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Unknown"}, {"sub_type":2, "value":"Unavailable"}]}
--With JSON_VALUE
SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, '$.payment_type') AS TINYINT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(20)) AS payment_type_desc0,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(JsonData, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(20)) AS payment_type_desc1
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (
    JsonData NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type;


--Better to use OPENJSON to work with array type json
select
    payment_type, sub_type, payment_type_desc_value
from openrowset(
        bulk 'payment_type_array.json',
        data_source = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (JsonData nvarchar(max)) as payment_type
    cross apply openjson (JsonData)
        with (  payment_type tinyint,
                payment_type_desc nvarchar(max) as JSON)
    cross apply openjson (payment_type_desc)
        with (
            sub_type tinyint,
            payment_type_desc_value varchar(20) '$.value'
        );
